0.Name: Sign
0.Text: YE WHO ENTER THESE TREACHEROUS GROUNDS, PREPARE FOR THE BATTLE OF A LIFETIME.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: I can't believe they let me write that on the sign.

1.Name: Me
1.Text: I don't even want to look at it anymore.

0.Name: Me
0.Text: The knight's about to wake up, better get out quick.

0.Name: Boss
0.Text: Hey! What are you still doing down there?

0.Name: Boss
0.Text: Our meeting is starting in five minutes!

0.Name: Boss
0.Text: You better get out of there before the knight wakes up!

0.Name: Me
0.Text: Well, I'm right next to the elevator, I should make it in time.
